docs.text: hollywood is a pimp .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a fat , cigar-smoking chump wearing a fur hat and 12 gold chains around its fat , hairy chest .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: all of its stars and starlets are an evil brood of scum-sucking vampires looking for the next percentage take , the next summer blockbuster , the next casting couch to audition on .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: pumping out comic-book adaptations , terrible sequels to mediocre films , and remakes of foreign films to the nearest american movie multiplex mall theater equipped with thin walls and bad sound systems .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: how much longer can the works of peckinpah , fassbinder , fuller , castle , preminger , and lee be placed and forgotten in the wrong sections of the local blockbuster stores ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: how many more silver and weinstein films can we enduring in this stinky , decaying state of american cinema ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but now , from john " i don't give a shit what you think about my movies " waters , comes the siren call to all frustrated filmmakers and aficionados : cecil b . demented , a warped and twisted tale of how far a filmmaker will go to create a personal vision of internal and social revolution .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: stephen dorff , in a career-defining role , is cecil b . demented , a crazed director devoted to making the most radical underground film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: together with his film production cult , the sprocket holes - who wear tattoos of peckinpah , lee , fuller , castle , anger , fassbinder , preminger on various parts of their bodies as badges of honor , they kidnap a hollywood movie starlet , played with perfect ridiculousness by melaine griffith , and force her to take the starring role in demented's film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with no budget and no contracts for extras , demented and his crew take to the streets for production of raving beauty , a crass terrorist film about an angry owner of an independent theater and her brood out to destroy the mainstream film business .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: using " ultimate reality " - with real bullets , real people , and real terror - demented and his crew of misfits attack a mall theater , terrorize the maryland film commission and crash a movie studio shooting a certain sequel to a really annoying tom hanks film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: demented's crewmembers are maimed and killed , popcorn machines are used for target practice , and no one can have sex until the film is complete .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's like bowfinger , only , you know , good .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film moves with zigs and zags like the magic bullet of kennedy's assassination .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the zeal of demented's cause catches quickly and conveys the urgent message of " doing something , anything , for the accomplishment of artistic motivations . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the crewmembers all hold the quirkiness common in water's previous films - pink flamingos , hairspray , polyester , pecker -- and speak in the choppy , jaded dialogue used frequently by waters .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is as if water's script strips away the unnecessary dialogue common to most pretentious indie films and just delivers the goods .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cecil takes such warped avenues of expression that it seems like it might actually outdo itself .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: you can see how a major studio might take this film , re-edit it , cut a deal with the remaining crew members who are still alive , and make a few sequels , a la the blair witch project .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but that's for the future .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: overall , the ride is fantastic ; it's one of water's best films to date and this year's fight club for filmmakers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: director/writer : john waters starring : stephen dorff , melaine griffith , alicia witt , adrian grenier , larry gilliard jr . , mink stole , ricki lake , kevin nealon producers : john fielder , mark tarlov , anthony delorenzo , joe caraccio jr .
docs.label: positive
